definition: to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 沒譜|没谱[mei2 pu3]
lit. the ugly daughter-in-law must sooner or later meet her parents-in-law (idiom)/fig. it's not something you can avoid forever
pinyin: chou3 xi2 fu4 zao3 wan3 ye3 dei3 jian4 gong1 po2
related.word: 丑媳妇早晚也得见公婆

definition: certainly/also written 一準|一准[yi1 zhun3]
to have a plan/to know what one is doing
to do as one sees fit/It's up to you./Let's wait and see and then decide what to do.
lit. there is not even the first stroke of the character 八 (idiom)/fig. things have not even begun to take shape/no sign of success yet
pinyin: ba1 zi4 hai2 mei2 yi1 pie3 'r

definition: more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
lit. there is not even the first stroke of the character 八 (idiom)/fig. things have not even begun to take shape/no sign of success yet
